tool_description: Sends personalized email reminders to non-respondent participants with customizable templates, subject lines, and tracking capabilities.

survey_link.description: Survey URL to include in the reminder

error_messages: Invalid email addresses: One or more email addresses are not in valid format.
Invalid survey_link: Survey link must be a valid URL.
Empty subject_line: Subject line cannot be empty.
Unsupported template: Supported templates are [standard, urgent, final, friendly].
Unsupported urgency_level: Supported levels are [low, normal, high, urgent].
Email service unavailable: Email delivery service is currently unavailable.
usage: Provide recipient_emails, survey_link, and subject_line. Optionally customize with reminder_template, sender_name, and urgency_level. Returns delivery status for each email.

delivery_timestamp.description: When the email batch was sent

batch_id.description: Unique identifier for this email batch
